dungeons.name: The Trunk
dungeons.description: Playing in your room, you find an old chest. Your father's name is engraved on its heavy lid along with a strange number. The perfect hiding spot... .

dungeons.name: Bullying
dungeons.description: Only 17 and already in hell, but dad said if the teachers won't do anything, I should...

dungeons.name: Graduation
dungeons.description: Your graduation day arrives. Mother stumbles in late, reeking of alcohol, while father remains conspicuously absent.

dungeons.name: The Pitch
dungeons.description: Your first major opportunity at work. You work all night to perfect your presentation, missing your partner's birthday in the process.

dungeons.name: Fatherhood
dungeons.description: Your child is born. You're there physically—but distant emotionally. You promise yourself you won't be like your father.

dungeons.name: The Funeral
dungeons.description: Your mother dies after years of alcoholism. You plan the funeral alone while your son avoids your calls.

dungeons.name: Retirement
dungeons.description: You retire after a long, dutiful career. The ceremony is quiet, like your marriage. Your wife leaves you shortly after.

dungeons.name: Reconciliation
dungeons.description: Years after retirement, you decide to drive cross-country to reconnect with your estranged son. You're unsure if he'll even open the door.

dungeons.name: The Family Album
dungeons.description: You find an old family photo album in the attic. It's curated—only the happy photos are included. You begin hunting down the missing ones.

dungeons.name: The Deathbed
dungeons.description: You're in a hospital bed, breathing slowly. Someone is holding your hand. You can't tell which son it is. The other hand aches with absence.
